about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Commitment to Caregivers
about.description: Spitex JCare was founded to provide comprehensive support to caregiving relatives in Switzerland. We understand the challenges you face and are here to help through personalized support, resources, and guidance. Our team of experienced care professionals specializes in guiding you through the caregiving process and ensuring you receive the support you need.

1.title: Consultation

2.title: Planning
2.description: Development of a customized care plan tailored to your situation.

3.title: Support
3.description: Continuous support and guidance throughout your caregiving journey.

4.title: Follow-up
4.description: Regular check-ins to ensure your needs are being met.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to Your Most Important Questions

1.question: What services does Spitex JCare offer?
1.answer: We offer a range of support services for caregiving relatives, including personal consultation, caregiving support resources, training, and access to professional care assistance.

2.question: How can I access your services?
2.answer: You can easily reach us through our contact form, and a member of our team will contact you within 24 hours to arrange an initial consultation.

3.question: Are your services covered by health insurance?
3.answer: Many of our services may be covered by health insurance depending on your specific policy. We can help you clarify your coverage and submit necessary documentation.

4.question: In which cantons do you operate?
4.answer: We currently offer our services in the cantons of Zurich, Bern, Basel, and Lucerne. We plan to expand our services to additional cantons in the near future.

5.question: How do you differ from other care services?
5.answer: Our unique approach focuses on comprehensive support for caregiving relatives. We not only provide direct care services but also ensure that caregivers themselves receive the support, training, and resources they need to provide quality care while looking after their own well-being.
